website_summaries.verdict: The best budget disc brake lock that offers much of the same protection and durability as more expensive options.
pros: The profile of the lock is small and easy to store in motorcycle cases or bags when not in use
The keyhole is easily accessible when the lock is fully engaged
cons: The key can be a bit tricky to use when unlocking the device

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality product at a great price. The downside to the product is registering the product to receive Master Locks $1000 if your bike gets stolen using their product. You can’t do it on line and you need a lot of paperwork and it must be mailed certified to master lock. You must have a bill of sale with purchase amount. Insurance documents Bar code from package And you must fill out a paper with your personal information. Just seemed like a hassle to get people not to register the lock.
customer_reviews.author: anthony perry

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine when i received it, but after 1-2 weeks the lock started to fail and the key did not unlock it completely anymore ( round shaft only went up half way which left it stuck on my bike multiple times). problem only got worse and is now unreliable. The key hole is difficult to use and takes some skill to unlock even when working properly (? By design). Now it just doesn't work and is impossible to use. Not built to last. would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: One turn and done.
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart in seconds. The very 1st turn of the key and the entire assembly fell apart and there was virtually no chance of me getting it back together. I processed a return, for this item only, 5 minutes after opening the item. The pin that holds the barrel in place is very tiny. After seeing the insides of this item I would not spend a dime on it. I'm looking for a different Disc lock this time.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money -- breaks far to easily
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Broke very easily -- my wife went to move my motorcycle to a different spot in our driveway and didn't notice the lock was on and the lock broke immediately just from her pushing the bike (engine was off and bike was in neutral). Waste of money. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Warnke

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk - broke in less than 12 months after <10 uses. Every time I used it I had to fiddle with the key to get it to lock/unlock, which made me wonder if it was going to get stuck in the locked position. Finally the whole lock cylinder just popped out and it self destructed. Not what I would expect from a "Master Lock" product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Foote

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: This item performs it's job very well. The look of it deters thiefs. A lot of this can be attributed to the bright orange color. The reminder cable makes it easy to remember that the disc lock is being used. This unit has been very durable for me. I haven't had any problems out of it. I'm not sure if the disc lock can be picked or if the keys from other units can unlock this one, but the look alone is enough to keep the bad guys away. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I use it for a moped in the DR. A much needed anti theft device. The locking mechanism is a little wonky and sometimes needs more than a giggle to open. It works though and comes with a nice little dont forget to remove me cable.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Good motorcycle lock
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, if someone wants to steal your bike they will steal your bike. However, this lock is well made, easy to use and may make it less desirable to steal your bike. Worth the peace of mind in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Ben E

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: it's a pile of crap. I guess you get what you pay for. Mine stayed locked after maybe the 10th use (max). I had to take the wheel of and band on the lock cylinder to get it to finally loosen. I thought I was going to have to take a hacksaw or angle grinder to it, not that it would have been difficult. This pos is made from pot metal.
customer_reviews.author: arthu

customer_reviews.title: Serves purpose as deterrent.  Keyhole is flimsy and cheap.
customer_reviews.text: It's good because it's cheap and it's serves it's purpose as a deterrent (no disc lock would actually prevent a determined thief). The only problem is that the key hole is very cheap and sometimes gets twisted up. One time I couldn't get the key in for 5+ minutes. Many other times had trouble with it. Not a huge deal but could potentially be a big deal if you are not able to get the key in and all of a sudden you are stranded. It's cheap enough that it feels like one day it just may not work. But for $17 I got what I paid for, so a few months in I rate it a good 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully works well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this lock for about a week as a theft deterrent and I cant say yet how well it has worked. I feel better knowing that if my steering was unlocked that they can not just roll by bike away and would need to lift it onto a flatbed truck or use a grinder for a long time to cut if off. I have seen other bikes in my neighborhood with this attached so I figured it cant hurt my chances of staying safe on the streets of NYC
customer_reviews.author: Dana Rocco Macri

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: these kept me more at ease when parking it overnight at a hotel. They lock is a little finicky but they are secure. I wish the lanyard was about 6 inches longer so it reached the handlebars a little easier. I have to stretch the wire
customer_reviews.author: Lost Pathfinder

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described - works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Seems solid and lock functions well. Nothing is gonna stop a determined thief, but at least I feel like this makes it harder - hopefully hard enough that they will just move on and leave my little scooter alone!
customer_reviews.author: KimJoe

customer_reviews.title: Great product, one isolated problem, overall great!
customer_reviews.text: I use three of these on my Suzuki GSX-R 600. It seems to work well, and I have had only one problem. The cylinder seems to have gotten stuck once, and it took me 10 minutes to unlock the lock. But it seems to have been an isolated incident. All in all, it's kept my bike from being stolen by at least being a deterrent. Using three I think helps. I also align them to keep the bike from rolling forward or backward.
customer_reviews.author: Tom J.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nothing will stop someone from taking your bike if they really want it. But the bright color will let them know it's not going to be very easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Fit
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar Master Lock which worked fine but eventually the lock wore out. I have no problem with that. The issue is the replacement I got from Master Lock is way too short and won't fit on my bike's disk. I need at least 2" and the replacement I got measures @ 1 1/2" I'm going to get a lock from another company
customer_reviews.author: skier X

customer_reviews.title: A must for motorcycles/scooters that are outdoors
customer_reviews.text: A very solid and well built lock. The included cable is to go on your lock and stretch to the handle bar so you remember to take the lock off before driving off. It comes with three keys and a way to get even more keys cut and sent to you.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deterant..compact, and econmical and a necessity
customer_reviews.text: I live in the city and park my bike on the streets. This is perfect. It looks the wheel so u can't move the bike. The tether is highly visible as well and it's compact. I would recommend though to have something else as well such as a big chain on the other ruff that u can anchor to a pole or something
customer_reviews.author: Patfromchicago

customer_reviews.title: and it was a pain in the butt the first few times trying to free my poor little disc
customer_reviews.text: The locking mechanism is a bit tricky to get used to, the particular combination of push-twist-release, and it was a pain in the butt the first few times trying to free my poor little disc. BUT! It works as advertised and the bright color plus reminder cable haven't failed me yet. For the price, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Clara W.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't inspire a lot of faith in it's ability to ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't inspire a lot of faith in it's ability to dissuade a potential bike thief, but for the price, I suppose it's supposed to be more of a visual flag than a physical deterrent. Edit: Forgot to include, the key is often very difficult to use. Perhaps its the Texas humidity, but the plates inside the locking mechanism love to stick together and leave me fumbling for 2+ minutes trying to get them to slide into place *just so.*
customer_reviews.author: Z H

customer_reviews.title: Poor lock quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be good thing it is but quality is poor not in seller just item . Key is a pain to try and use doesn't go in easy and lock isnt easy to open . Infact I stopped using it because was afraid it get locked on and not able to get it to unlock it .
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $$
customer_reviews.text: 2014 Ducati Monster 796. Works just fine. No carry pouch supplied. Three keys came with the lock. Great deterrence for the money, simple to use, and small enough to carry under the seat or in your backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hartke

customer_reviews.title: BUNGEE for thought....
customer_reviews.text: Best value for my buck. The lowest tech highest protection you can get for you bike. I like the bungee idea so you can throw it over the handlebars as a reminder that the brake lock is on before you take off. Because if you forget it's on and take off, oh boy... that'll ruin your day and your bike...
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this lock is first class. I knew I wanted something highly visible, and it had to be effective obviously. But the greatest surprise of all hapenned when I read the packaging. Turns out, Masterlock actually believes so much in their motorcycle lock, they warrant it...to the tune of $1000 against the theft of your bike! Wow! How many people, in today's day and age, would actually do that?
customer_reviews.author: Rich Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works, exactly as you want
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy lock, sturdy everything. Lock your bike overnight? This is a very good way to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain kind of guy

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a little more security when parking my bike outside in the driveway at night. This is handy. Its much smaller than I originally anticipated but that is good, as I can fit it in my saddle bags. I just park it, latch it to my front tire and put the reminder strap on the handle (remember to use the strap as I almost forgot one day and was ready to drive away.) Great product for the price and the bright orange helps you remember you put it on.
customer_reviews.author: J Lord

customer_reviews.title: Master Lock
customer_reviews.text: Just got the Master Lock today, April 7, that i ordered TWO DAYS ago, April 5! Great job, Amazon! Not much to say, though about the Master Lock. It's pretty cut and dry. It's a VERY bright Orange/Red and says, "Hey Guy, dont even bother. You're not gonna get very far". Easy to use. And cheap. What else do you want? Oh, you want it to make a beeping sound, and say "Stay Away" when someone gets near your precious bike? Well... go spend an extra 75+, partner.
customer_reviews.author: Be_the_alpenglow

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk don't waste your money it won't open get stuck on your motorcycle I had to get a grinder and cut it off good thing I was at home
customer_reviews.author: cameron bartley

customer_reviews.title: I like the lanyard that comes with it
customer_reviews.text: The key is kinda tricky to get lined up in the key-hole, takes a couple attempts to get the teeth on the tumbler to unlock. but this only takes 5 seconds.I like the lanyard that comes with it, I loop it on my clutch lever so I can visually see that I have the lock on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great deterrent!
customer_reviews.text: Great lock, there is an anti-theft warranty for up to $1000, which is great considering thats the value of my bike. I have an old motorcycle that has NO KEY, just a switch and start button and anyone can steal it, this lock works great as a deterrent. Feels strong but at the same time if someone was really looking to jack your stuff you may want to get something a little stronger. Comes with three keys which is great the lock is the size of my hand and fits perfectly in a small bag pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: I still have my motorcycle...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I have peace of mind. Easy to use. This is one of those items that you may never know if it truly works until it's too late. But If I was a thief this would definitely make me look for easier prey. I put on rear and lock the front forks. Would take a lot of effort to steal a bike in that configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Koning

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Cheep sometimes don't wanna unlock like today spent half an hour trying to unlock it with no lock had to walk home and leave my bike at work buying a better quality one
customer_reviews.author: Rob g

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My scooter stayed where it was in an apartment parking space for a year. This lock works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cord is great to prevent you from rolling in your bike with ...
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the key will be a little hard to put in with one hand, but nothing that will make you hat it. The cord is great to prevent you from rolling in your bike with the lock still on and.... to the floor! (I've seen it many times)
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: It locks the disc. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: What are you expecting?! It locks a disc with reasonable accuracy, priced the same as two gallons of gas. An idiot with a hammer can break it in about 10-20 minutes. If this is your primary method of securing your motorcycle, you're in a world of hurt. Still, if you're using it on a GS500 parked next to some shiny new R6's, you'll find this especially useful.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Doing its job so far.
customer_reviews.text: Been doing its job just fine. Feels sturdy, not cheaply made. The only problem I have is that the lock mechanism spins and it becomes difficult to insert the key at times. Becomes a pain at night when I can't see inside of it well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just OK
customer_reviews.text: Not the best construction, sometimes the lock takes a little persistence to get it to open.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Previty

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock!
customer_reviews.text: Good and secure. I have owned this for seven years and not much more I can say about it except that it always works on my Aprilia scooter. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: VERY STRONG BUT DID NOT COME WITH CABLE..
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU MESS UP AND FORGET TO TAKE IT OFF YOUR CALIPER ... WOW! YOULL DO A FRONT WHEEL STAND.. YEA.. THIS PRODUCT IS UNBREAKABLE AS FAR AS I CAN TELL.. MINE DID NOT COME WITH THAT CABLE THOUGH...
customer_reviews.author: Jay Micale "Hawk" Professional Pool Player & Instructor for Daytonajay Billiards LLC, Retired ASE Master Auto Technician

customer_reviews.title: Just for show
customer_reviews.text: Some bastard got some of his homies together and licked up my R6. Though the lock worked fine, it did not accomplish anything.
customer_reviews.author: Filip Leszczynski

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Came with 3 keys. Felt better aboit leaving my bike outside at hotel overnight. Cord great reminder i had the lock on it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: The damage from the master lock on your brake disk could be pretty bad if you forget it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to prevent a push-away of my bike in the garage. It works okay, but I now use the Kryptonite 999621 instead. The damage from the master lock on your brake disk could be pretty bad if you forget it. The Kryptonite instead locks the sprocket which is a much safer option for me.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The rental company wanted me to use these when rented a bike recently. Found them easy to use and decided to buy for my own bike. Like them a lot. Now looking for a small storage pouch to keep them handy.
customer_reviews.author: Djimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Only cost around $15. I'd recommened getting one that has an alarm on it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality/ short cable
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy lock which is easy to use. The cable is a little short and hard to reach the handle bars on a Victiry CC.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: My backup Lock
customer_reviews.text: This lock feels flimsy to me and I worry that it wouldn't take much to remove it. I use when I'm at the grocery store but wouldn't trust it for higher security when parking my Vespa on the street. This lock is light weight and easy to install. I like the cord and use all the time regardless of the lock used.
customer_reviews.author: Danners

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Biggest pile of junk ive ever bought, key twist in lock but won't unlock, threw it in the trash can and bought a different brand local
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It's easy attach the lock the freak and the included lock reminder reaches easily to my handlebar an is highly visible. I would highly recommend this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Crysania Weese

customer_reviews.title: OK lock and warning tether- fits disks with holes only
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have to kneel down near the ground to lock my scooter. To lock, open and remove key, kneel and find a 1/4" hole that's 10" off the ground and lock.
customer_reviews.author: DowPeter

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: Great lock, easy to apply and release. feel confident that it will protect my bike I wish the safety cord was a couple of inches longer. I have to really stretch it to get it over my handgrip.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works but...
customer_reviews.text: Works but the tumbler is really loose feeling and occasionally, it is really difficult to remove the key.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Osborne

customer_reviews.title: It's works exactly like it should
customer_reviews.text: It's works exactly like it should! Very heavy duty for the price. Comes with THREE keys stash extra keys well! You do not want o try and cut this thing off.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, one for the front wheel and one for the back. I mostly lock the back wheel ever since someone warned me that if only the front wheel is locked, someone could do a "wheelie" and ride the bike away.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Alex

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It came fast but doesn't do anything to protect your bike of getting stolen! It's hard to open the locker using the key! I use it like 5 time only one time I move the bike while it was off with the lock on my rear and it broke!
customer_reviews.author: Darkely A.

customer_reviews.title: A Piece of Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Quite working after the 3rd use on a 6,000 mile ride. It will not open up and the good thing was that it didn't happen when it was on the brake rotor.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Decent lock
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Seems like it should fit most bikes with disk brakes. Being a bright color and having a cable is a plus. Sometime the lock feels finicky when unlocking it. Doesn't really bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy P.

customer_reviews.title: didn't stop theft.
customer_reviews.text: this seemed like a pretty good product until I found that someone had pried it off to steal my motorcycle. they couldnt cut through the locking pin so they pulled the sides apart until there was a space to pull it off.
customer_reviews.author: user

customer_reviews.title: Great little lock
customer_reviews.text: I can easily store this in my jacket as I'm riding around, or pop it into my bike's compartment when on the go. It's quick and easy to handle and the brightly coloured strap reminds me to be sure to remove it before rolling again. Great lock.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Security in a compact package!
customer_reviews.text: Security in a compact package! Easy to use and great as another deterrent to thieves.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Good lock.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my 2011 HD super glide. It goes on with no problems the wire is a little short but not buy much it still reaches the and boss very sturdy lock works flawlessly no issues no problems recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sanman66

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just wish the cord was a little longer...
customer_reviews.author: Oditius

customer_reviews.title: Easy to unlock and lock
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Hopefully no one ever tries to steal my bike, so I don't know how it would hold up to a thief trying to take my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Ended up returning it after trying to install the lock and spending the better part of 30 minutes to unlock it
customer_reviews.text: This lock is not a smooth key operation. Ended up returning it after trying to install the lock and spending the better part of 30 minutes to unlock it.
customer_reviews.author: Tomahawk

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price i guess
customer_reviews.text: Ok, but you have to play with the key to unlock😳
customer_reviews.author: harold steward

customer_reviews.title: Failure: Slap On, Slap Off to Unlock
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it a zero if I could, unlocks without a key by slapping the broad side of the lock. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Good price, and does what it's advertised to. Using on my Honda rebel. Just another layer of protection I'm using, ya know unfortunately, it takes more than one. Lock works fer me.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the lock. It is red which matches my bike. It will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best protection for the price.
customer_reviews.text: After a few thefts in my apartment complex I noticed that my bike had been moved a few feet even with the handlebars in the locked position. Now they can t move it more than 1 foot. I feel a lot better about my vehicle no thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Clint "Kronik" Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use mine all the time. Nothing is fool proof but it makes a great deterrent to thieves.
customer_reviews.author: George M

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the delivery and the
customer_reviews.text: Arrived brand new in a blister package. I am very happy with the delivery and the product
customer_reviews.author: Robert Crescenzi

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, after spraying it with graphite. Easy to use and easily seen. I would recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Sabathwolf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Compact enough to fit in the pocket of my jacket while riding and no one's broken it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Horus

customer_reviews.title: but it deters a lot of thieves who are hoping for an easy target.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchase this for my Honda CRF250L. It fits perfectly, and takes literally 1 second to attach/remove. It will not guarantee your bikes safety, but it deters a lot of thieves who are hoping for an easy target.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it said it would be and a awesome price. Just as good as the more expensive ones!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The locking pin was a bit tricky to figure out ...
customer_reviews.text: The locking pin was a bit tricky to figure out. Try it a few times before you lock up to the disc. It needed some WD-40 to make it function adequately.
customer_reviews.author: Nuklhed

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE:  I couldn't unlock it!
customer_reviews.text: While I was familiarizing myself with the product, I couldn't open it! This would've been a REAL problem if I had locked my scooter in it. Stay away from it. It isn't worth the risk!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Snodgrass

customer_reviews.title: Dated lock
customer_reviews.text: Lock register information was over 9 years old. Had to find phone number of manufacturer to resend warranty Info twice effort and double cost for certified mailings.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Thieves see these lock styles and keep on walking. Great product that is easy to use and comes with a warranty from Master Lock which includes a reimbursement if your motorcycle or scooter is stolen. Great value and will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: C B Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Just don't forget it's on the brake. You WILL fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony10370

customer_reviews.title: This lock is garbage! Didn't even use it once
customer_reviews.text: This lock is garbage! Didn't even use it once! Took it out of the package to test it before locking my wheel and it does not lock! I would never trust my valuables with this lock!
customer_reviews.author: christa

customer_reviews.title: sort of works
customer_reviews.text: This sort of works, I have to fiddle around with the lock for it to open , I spent anywhere frlm 1-2 min getting it open, it sucks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the key is hard to get into the hole, perhaps a side effect of anti pick locking internals. Should work well though, I couldn't see how anyone could get this off without an electric saw
customer_reviews.author: Craig Cowden

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Product works as intended. i have no problems with it. I find it easy to use and the orange reminder cable is a must!! i almost rode off with it on, sometimes you tend to forget. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: B.M.-Bey

customer_reviews.title: Key doesn't work very good. Have to wiggle the key every time to ...
customer_reviews.text: Key doesn't work very good. Have to wiggle the key every time to get it unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: tiger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes the thieves think twice cause its gonna take time to get it off
customer_reviews.author: SinSear001

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment. Does the job perfectly but should of spent a little more and bought one with alarm
customer_reviews.author: Palo customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Came with 3 keys too
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Came with 3 keys too. Attached well to front rotor and cord go to lever or bars to remind you of the lock.
customer_reviews.author: christine hawks

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great perfect fit for my Honda phantom...pin fits through home in rotor.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Jeter

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good for the $ I've had it for a month now. Small, so it tucks away in a pocket or under the seat, works well so far. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Great so far, worth the money for the added piece of mind to protect your baby from theft! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lock.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little difficult to get used to unlocking, but seems to work pretty well. The cord could be a bit longer, too.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not too big, not too small. Fits in the rotor hole on my 1996 Kawasaki Vulcan 800.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk the cylinder got stuck and would not unlock. Would not recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Nathan E. Gray

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. The leash is a little short for my ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The leash is a little short for my full size cruiser
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately it not on my bike
customer_reviews.text: Lock malfunctioned and took forever to get off my bike. Once off I began to test it and now the lock will not unlock. Fortunately it not on my bike. I would not recommend this lock to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C. MAYFIELD

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Obviously nothing can keep your bike from getting stolen but things like this lock help deter thieves! Might buy another one for the front wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Magana

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works but all it does it just keeps someone from rolling your dirt bike away.
customer_reviews.author: KAG

customer_reviews.title: Other than that works good.
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble unlocking it once. Other than that works good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Joshua L. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Offers 0 protection.  Easily defeated.
customer_reviews.text: My motorcycle was locked up in a very public area. Thieves broke the lock and rode off with the motorcycle so fast that no one had time to do anything about it. For appearances only, I guess...
customer_reviews.author: Finch

customer_reviews.title: A must have for bike owners
customer_reviews.text: You have to have one even if you put your bike in the garage at night, it will atleast slow them down. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM T. FIX

product_meta.title: Master Lock Disc Brake Lock with Steel Shackle, 2 in. Wide, 8303DPS
product_meta.description:
The Master Lock No. 8303DPS Disc Brake Lock features a 2in (51mm) zinc steel body providing rust protection. The high security disc cylinder and steel shackle offer added resistance to picking and cutting. The bright red cord serves as a reminder to remove lock before riding. The Anti-Theft Guarantee and Limited Lifetime Warranty provides peace of mind from a brand you can trust.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Joy riding on your bike should be an exclusive thrill for you – not an opportunistic thief.

Disc brake locks prevent ride or roll away theft. Heavy duty construction with an easy, high security push–button lock cylinder can be installed in seconds. A bright orange lock body and cord help remind you to remove the lock before riding. Don't leave your motorcycle unprotected––install a Master Lock disc brake lock and you'll feel safer. Enjoy your ride.



DISC BRAKE LOCKS Whether you ride the water, snow, dirt or roads, don't play the odds when you park your Power Sport vehicle. Protect your investment. Latch on to Master Lock and all of the patented products and street smarts we provide.
feature_bullets: LOCK APPLICATION: Best used for motorcycles, mopeds and scooters
EASE OF USE: Disc lock has easy push-button locking system; Bright red reminder cord reminds you to remove lock before riding
DURABLE DESIGN: Zinc steel body provides rust protection and high security disc cylinder and steel shackle offer added resistance to picking and cutting motorcycle lock; $1,000 anti-theft guarantee
SPECIFICATIONS: 2 in. throat with 1/4 in. shackle
INCLUDES: Brake lock, reminder cord, and three keys
